Header.title: Bolivar
Header.paragraph: We have the BEST SLOGEN and BEST RESULTS

About.paragraph: Our vision is to locate real estate opportunities for our investors that will guarantee them a high yield and diversity to their investment's portfolio in a way that is tailored to the economic challenges of the modern world. Therefore, our emphasis is on developing city centers with high potential for price increases in the short and long term, which allows our investors to enjoy high benefits of the purchased apartments in parallel with the increase in the value of the property.

Team.name: Moutassim Ghneim
Team.about: A previous managing partner in leading law firm in Israel and as an associate in international law firms, Moutassim was responsible for consulting and providing legal assistance for a large number of real estate projects, including consulting for corporations and boards of directors, establishment of trust mechanism, functioning as a trustee for private investors and handling complicated litigation cases. Moutassim has extensive international experience in the field of legal consulting for the world's leading real estate management funds.

Team.name: Tiago Rodrigues
Team.about: Founder and manager of Inside B, which is a project management and consultancy company specialized in services dedicated to the real estate investment value chain. We try to rapidly adapt to the needs of our clients, certain that managing change is the only certainty in this business that supports an increasingly competitive scenario. Our clients value our availability, integrity, professionalism, and honesty. We try to reinforce this identity every day. We build partnerships and we are focused on results.

Team.name: Alex Cohen
Team.about: Architect Alex Cohen graduated from the Faculty of Architecture and Urban Planning at the Technion in Haifa in 1966. Has worked continuously as a planning architect and since 1972 as the owner of an independent office that deals with architectural planning and design for various types of projects in Israel and abroad. The studio is proud that all its clients from all years, without exception, in private and public projects recommend the quality of planning, the level of trust and service. Among them are Nochi Dankner, Pini Cohen, Moshe Bublil, Eli Gelman, Yehuda Levy, Shabtai Shavit, Eli Zeira, Eitan Cohen, Haim Geir, Haim Gabrieli and more. The experience was acquired in different and varied types of projects. For more information please visit the following link:

Team.name: Filipa Crespo Osório
Team.about: Graduated in architecture in 2006 at Faculdade de Ciências e Tecnologia da Universidade de Coimbra having made one academic year at Università degli Studi di Roma - La Sapienza. After graduation she worked in Architecture Offices in Barcelona and Lisbon and has participated in several national and international competitions. In 2012/13 she attended the Advanced Studies Course in Digital Architecture (CEAAD) at ISCTE-IUL+FAUP and then started her PhD at ISCTE-IUL, ISTAR-IUL with the theme Origami Surfaces for Kinetic Architecture, which was completed in 2020. Currently she has her own firm for architecture, graphic design and 3D images production, at the same time she teaches software for the Interior Design Course at LSD - Lisbon School of Design.

Team.name: Dr. Pedro Pinto Monteiro
Team.about: Degree in Law from the Oporto Catholic University Faculty of Law from 1995 to 2000. Completed his legal practice internship between 2001 and 2002. Member of the Portuguese Bar Association since 2002 (Professional Card nº 9718P). Currently attending a Master's Degree in Local Authorities Law at the Faculty of Law of the University of Minho (currently developing his thesis on the subject: 'The application of Criminal Sanctions by the Court of Auditors'. As a lawyer he has practiced mainly in the areas of civil, corporate  and energy law.

Team.name: Teresa Pinto Ribeiro
Team.about: Graduated in Architecture at the Escola Superior Artística do Porto (2006), and has a post-graduate qualification in Advanced Studies in Architectural Heritage at the Faculdade de Arquitectura da Universidade do Porto (2013). During her academic career she attended Laboratorio di Progettazione dell'Architettura IV and Laboratorio di Restauro at the Facoltà di Architettura dell' Università degli Studi di Firenze, in Italy, as a free-mover student. He did an internship at the studio of Carlos Ferrater, OAB - Office of Architecture in Barcelona (2007-2008). Since then she has been collaborating with several ateliers and architects, and developing her own projects of Architecture and Interior Design. At the same time she teaches Project Methodology of Interior Design at LSD - Lisbon School of Design. Above all she follows her passions: Architecture, Music and Dance... to which she allies Photography and an obsession for travelling. She loves places, architectures, music, movements... in Portugal and in the world.
